data.message: Thank you fb for reviewing  2 comments sent to in which mine and my families lives were threatened to be wiped off the face of this earth. So people can make threats to kill others and you find nothing wrong with the content.  You don't care at all about bullying or threats to lives!! But if I post a picture of me giving my newborn baby a bath or breastfeeding it's removed!!!! Disgusting. ......

replies.message: I reported a death threat against police officers and fb said it wasn't in violation with their policy.
